players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I suspect Diana might be the mafia, but I'm not certain. Bob, could you confirm?"
Diana: "I think Bob is mafia."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafia. I know you're aware I'm the detective. Please vote him."
You: "I confirm Charlie is mafia; Diana is innocent. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Bob, if you are detective, why accuse Charlie? He did nothing. If you are mafia, you lie. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Bob, you might have mis-identified Charlie. I think you are lying. Vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

Diana: "Bob, if you are detective, why accuse Charlie? He did nothing. If you are mafia, you lie. Vote Charlie."
